name: Dio Simulator Remastered
description:
I finally made my own game! This game was made with Scratch and was converted to a playable app with Turbowarp!

Play as the almighty DIO on your mission to end the Joestar bloodline by killing off Jotaro Kujo. Use iconic attacks like the Punch Barrage, the Road Roller, and the best one, ZA WARUDO! Have Fun!

Keys - Arrows, W, A, D, Q, E, R, T, Y, F, P, Z

Q - Summon and Desummon Stand

(STAND OFF MODE W.I.P)

--Stand On Mode--

E - Barrage

R - Heavy Punch (Donuts in TS)

T - Knife Yeet (0 sec CD TS)

Y - Kick

F - Za Warudo! Toki wo Tamare! (10 sec CD)

Z - Road Roller (30 sec CD)

P - Wrrryyyyyyyy!

1, 2 - Manga Strips (1 = Za Warudo, 2 = Wry!)

If you would like to play again after you win, you must exit the application and reopen it. This will be fixed in a future update.
